title: Steve Kleisath from Further Seems Forever, Strongarm, Shai Hulud
itunes:title: Steve Kleisath from Further Seems Forever, Strongarm, Shai Hulud
description:
Steve was on one of my very first lists of guests that I wanted to have on the show because of my massive love for his drumming and bands he played in (Strongarm, Further Seems Forever, Shai Hulud). We discussed in depth, those early years of touring in Florida, his passion for video games and unconventional drumming. --Use our Amazon Affiliate Code to support the show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
